attributes.action: Uphold the referendum result and consult the electorate before signing EU deals
attributes.additional_details: Because the UK voted for independence and this government are ignoring the electorate.
attributes.background: To enforce the referendum result and stop the government doing deals with the EU that gives away our rights and compel us to follow EU rules and will cost the British taxpayer money

rejection.details:
The following petition calls for a similar action: 

Do not seek closer ties with the EU 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710214
